name: mutocarogen-desolation
description:
Controls:

W, A, S, D to move

Space to jump

P to pause

Left click to use the pistol

Right click to use the shotgun

Middle click (click the scroll wheel) to use the grapple

Credits:

(names are links to their itch pages)

David Eisenberg: Producer and Aux. programmer

Keegan Butt: Stat, movement, and UI programmer

Keegan Ingersoll: Enemy, Wave, Weapon, and UI programmer

Lukas Woodger: Mechanic designer, 2D art creator, animator, and modeler

Madeline Visconte: Level designer, environment designer, and environmental model designer.

Matthew Carey: Sound designer, Model designer, and animation designer.
